title: Strong MDI Announces Appointment of New Representative Firm
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Ballantyne Strong, Inc. 
JOLIETTE, Quebec -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Strong MDI Screen Systems (NYSE MKT: BTN), a leading manufacturer of high quality projection screens for global cinema chains and specialty markets such as theatres, events, theme parks, rental & staging as well as educational and worship facilities, is pleased to announce the appointment of Mainline Marketing as the company’s representative for Florida, Puerto Rico and the Caribbean. 
From offices located in Melbourne, Orlando and Lakeland, Florida, Mainline Marketing will be promoting Strong MDI’s specialty screens for the Pro A/V market, namely its motorized screen systems, projection screen surfaces and custom support structures. 
Mainline Marketing is an award-winning independent manufacturers’ representation firm that manages sales, marketing and distribution for companies that produce professional audio and video equipment. Their main customer base consists of consultants, commercial audio visual integrators, broadcast and professional audio suppliers, music industry retailers and production/ rental companies. Clinton Muntean, President of Mainline Marketing commented, “I am very excited about working with Strong MDI Screens. Their ability to design and build custom screens for almost any application is very appealing to our customer base. Strong MDI has a track record for impeccable quality and service, which is something that we at Mainline always strive for.” 
Commenting on the new partnership, Strong MDI General Manager, Francois Barrette said, “Mainline Marketing was an obvious choice in our extension into other US markets. Clinton and his team are professionals. Their orientation toward exceptional customer service fits very well with our dedication to our clients and we are looking forward to having them on our team.” 
About Ballantyne Strong, Inc. ( www.strong-world.com ) Ballantyne Strong and its subsidiaries engage in diverse business activities including the design, integration and installation of technology solutions for a broad range of applications; development and delivery of out-of-home messaging, advertising and communications; manufacturing of projection screens; and providing managed services including monitoring of networked equipment. The Company focuses on serving the cinema, retail, financial, and government markets.
